snippet.title: ShadowHand Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Official trailer for the 2017 indie card-battling RPG/Visual Novel SHADOWHAND developed by Grey Alien Games and published by Positech Games.

Release date: December 7th 2017 on Steam, GoG and direct from the developer.

Website: https://www.facebook.com/Shadowhandgame
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/427490/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Shadowhandgame/

SET IN LATE 18TH CENTURY ENGLAND,
we follow the story of Lady Cornelia Darkmoor, a beguiling young aristocrat who masquerades as the notorious highwaywoman, Shadowhand. Fleeing a crime scene and forced to act under the cover of darkness, Shadowhand's mission to safeguard a woman she holds dear leads to a web of corruption, smuggling and blackmail.
